attributes.action: Close Scottish schools after 17th December 2020 to allow teachers time off
attributes.additional_details: England is closing early - Christmas is meant to be a 4 nation approach why is Scotland different?
attributes.background: Close the schools early for Christmas - allow teachers time off at Christmas instead of having to contact families for track and trace on Christmas Day - also beneficial for self isolation time prior to Christmas

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
